column4: i'm trying to install ubuntu on this crappy hp, no more than 512MB RAM and 1GHz processor, and this message keeps popping up: Buffer I/O error on device Fd0, logical block 0 - is it not finding my hard drive?
it's not finding your floppy drive
I had to disable my floppy in BIOS to get ubuntu to install, then enable it to get ubuntu to boot
